snippet.title: The Sprucecape Mod Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now: http://www.moddb.com/mods/the-sprucecape-mod/downloads
The Sprucecape Mod is a modification for Half-Life 2 Episode 2, featuring elements of classical Half-Life 2 action, exploration, horror and puzzles. In this single-player experience you step in the shoes of John Sprucecape, who is set on a dangerous quest to fing his escaping family. The road to them is all but easy and John has to fight and solve his way trough the hazardous environments of Alaska. This mod has updated the original map pack with some new textures, models, locations and combat for a new refreshing experience.
